==What to Check For==
Verify that location data is not logged.
==Why==
Logging location data is likely to raise privacy concerns among users.
==How to Check==
To verify that location data is not logged:
# **Identify whether the application uses location services.** # **Determine how location services are used.** Trace location data from source to sink and record each operation performed on it. # **Verify that location data is not logged.** Examine the trace of location data from source to sink to make sure that location data is not being logged either on the device or on any remote server.
==How to Fix==
If your application uses location data, do not store it in files and do not send it to remote servers.
